articles.title: Peru earthquake: Large 7.5 magnitude tremors hit South American country, seismologists confirm - The Independent
articles.description: No tsunami warning issued after 110km-deep tremor felt in Ecaudor and Colombia
articles.content:
A major earthquake with a magnitude of 7.5 has struck northern Peru, with some damage to homes and several minor injuries reported.
